src:
Gempa M 5 Terjadi di Bima NTB
03 Nov 2019, 04:53 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Gempa berkekuatan magnitudo (M) 5 terjadi di barat laut Bima, Nusa Tenggara Barat. Gempa tersebut tidak berpotensi tsunami.
Badan Meteorologi Klimatologi dan Geofisika (BMKG) menyebut gempa terjadi pada Minggu (3/11/2019) pukul 04.29 WIB. Kedalaman gempa berada pada 154 km.
Gempa ini berpusat di 23 km barat laut Bima. Lokasi tepatnya berada di koordinat 8,28 Lintang Selatan dan 118,60 Bujur Timur.
"Tidak berpotensi tsunami," tulis BMKG di akun Twitternya.

(fdu/fdu)
text:
M earthquake 5 occurred in Bima NTB
03 Nov 2019, 04:53 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - An earthquake with magnitude (M) 5 occurred in the northwest of Bima, West Nusa Tenggara. The earthquake had no tsunami potential.
The Meteorology and Climatology and Geophysics Agency (BMKG) said the earthquake occurred on Sunday (11/03/2019) at 04.29 WIB. The depth of the earthquake is at 154 km.
This earthquake was centered in 23 km northwest of Bima. The exact location is at coordinates 8.28 South Latitude and 118.60 East Longitude.
"There is no potential for a tsunami," BMKG wrote on his Twitter account.

(fdu / fdu)
